A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw the movie twice. The first time I saw I thought it was decent but some of the plot points didn't make a lot of sense especially the side mission of Finn and Rose was practically useless and Poe's mutiny was pointless. If anything was good. I was invested in the sexual tension between Kylo and Rey.  The second time I saw and after reading up on other people's point of view problems became glaring.  The SJW and political nonsense of diversity was more like a slap to viewers faces. The SJW preaching was more important then telling a good story.
